REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0463 reute d f BC-ALLWASTE-<ALWS>-TO-MA 03-04 0038

TEXT.TITLE: ALLWASTE <ALWS> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Allwaste Inc said it has agreed in principle to acquire an air-moving and related industrial services company it did not identify for up to 1,400,000 dlrs in common stock. Reuter
